meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference (Webex)

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the meeting held on July 10, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the Dallas Environmental Justice Screening Tool
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the Dallas Environmental Justice Screening Tool.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Natalie Requenez, Environmental Justice Coordinator, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Comprehensive Urban Agriculture Plan (CUAP) Briefing â€“ Year 1 Implementation
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Year 1 implementation of the Comprehensive Urban Agriculture Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Rabekha Siebert, Urban Agriculture Coordinator lll, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability; Yaritza Torres Espinoza, Urban Agriculture Coordinator ll, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Q3 LEAF/CECAP Update
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Paul White ll, Assistant Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Oppong Hemmeng, OEQS Senior Climate Coordinator, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Rosaerlinda Cisneros, OEQS Climate Coordinator, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Vote on Sustainable Procurement Policy Review
agenda_items.description: Vote to refer a review of the city's Sustainable Procurement Policy to the Implementation Subcommittee.

agenda_items.title: Vote on Tree Removal Metrics
agenda_items.description: Vote to recommend that the city implement a metric system for quantifying tree removal by development.
